bibl.seg: ROSEN Ralph M., Mixing of Genres and Literary Program in Herodas 8.

Argues that Herodas' dream, in alluding to an original (if not actual) dramatic element of mime, functions as an apologia for the bold combination of the dramatic and the iambographic that he incorporates into a new genre, the mimiamb.
